meaningMnemonic: Take a <radical>tree</radical> and make two <radical>moon</radical>-shaped <kanji>shelf</kanji> units with it. Moon radical-shaped, that is. Those moon radicals standing side by side kinda look like a shelf, don't you think? The tree on the left is just there to remind you it's made of wood, I guess. A lovely wooden shelf.
readingMnemonic: To match the moon radical shape, this would have to be a pretty tall <kanji>shelf</kanji>, meaning you can store a <reading>ton-a</reading>-stuff (たな) on it.
